scripts.test: elm make --docs=docs.json && elm-format src/ --validate && elm-test && npm run phantom-tests && elm-review
scripts.backport-rules: cp -r ../review-{common,debug,documentation,tea,unused}/{src,tests}/* tests ; cp -r ../elm-review-{simplification,noop,imports,noredundantconcat}/{src,tests}/* tests ; cp -r ../elm-review-scope/{src,tests}/* tests
